metadata.Title: CVE-2017-16231 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - negligible
metadata.Description: ** DISPUTED ** In PCRE 8.41, after compiling, a pcretest load test PoCproduces a crash overflow in the function match() in pcre_exec.c because ofa self-recursive call. NOTE: third parties dispute the relevance of thisreport, noting that there are options that can be used to limit the amountof stack that is used.

criterions.comment: pcre3: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
